name: Herman Miller Aeron Chair
description: The iconic ergonomic chair with 8Z Pellicle mesh suspension. Features PostureFit SL lumbar support, fully adjustable arms, and 12-year warranty. The gold standard.

reviews.review_text: Worth every penny. 10 years later still perfect.
Mesh keeps me cool during long coding sessions.
Expensive but 12-year warranty is peace of mind.
